original_text: And out of the ground the Lord God made to spring up every tree that is pleasant to the sight and good for food. The tree of life was in the midst of the garden, and the tree of the knowledge of good and evil.
korean_text: 여호와 하나님이 그 땅에서 보기에 아름답고 먹기에 좋은 나무가 나게 하시니 동산 가운데에는 생명 나무와 선악을 알게 하는 나무도 있더라

sentences.original_text: And out of the ground the Lord God made to spring up every tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호와 하나님께서 땅에서 모든 나무가 돋아나게 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: that is pleasant to the sight
The tree of life was in the midst of the garden
and the tree of the knowledge of good and evil.
